Question: Shenzhen Awell Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Awell Technology Co., Ltd.

USB Data Cable and Charger

- Specializes in manufacturing USB data cables, wall chargers, and car chargers
- Products approved by CE, FCC, RoHS
- Offers 12-month warranty and 100% tested products
- Provides free samples and custom manufacturing
- Fully automated & digital production lines with a daily capacity of 200,000 units
- Offers MFI certified cables and assistance with PPID certification
- Provides 24/7 customer support and free pick-up service in Shenzhen
- Welcomes exclusive distributor partnerships and custom cable design
- Has helped customers in over 30 countries and offers instant quotes through email inquiry
